body: Laritza's Laws notes the decision of the Havana Provincial Court in the case of the deaths, by starvation and cold, of 26 psychiatric patients in January 2010, saying: "So the trial ended. Sentences were handed out, but many questions remain."
original_body: Laritza's Laws notes the decision of the Havana Provincial Court in the case of the deaths, by starvation and cold, of 26 psychiatric patients in January 2010, saying: "So the trial ended. Sentences were handed out, but many questions remain."
title: Cuba: More Questions About Mazorra

sentence: Laritza's Laws notes the decision of the Havana Provincial Court in the case of the deaths, by starvation and cold, of 26 psychiatric patients in January 2010, saying: "So the trial ended.
Sentences were handed out, but many questions remain."
